author: zhenhu
body:
backport of #24829 

Note these newly added PU and pmx workflows can not be tested currently. 
The backport of fastSim2017 code (#24624) had not been merged when 9_4_10 was built, so the "RelValMinBiasFS_13_UP17_ForMixing" dataset can not be produced in 9_4_X yet.  

Two options now: 
1. We can merge this PR now (without testing these new wfs, which might be dangerous). Once 9_4_11_cand1 is built, we will produce the missing MinBias dataset and test the wfs. 
2. We build 9_4_11_cand1 without this PR, and produce the MinBias dataset with 9_4_11_cand1. At that time, this PR can be tested and it will merged for the next release.
title: Backport [9.4.X] : add fastsim 2017 PU and pmx wfs
